forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High near 15C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 61F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Areas of patchy fog. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Areas of patchy fog. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 63F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
